title: Kitchen Garden Live with the Hairy Bikers
overview: The Hairy Bikers, Si King and Dave Myers, are live at the RHS Hampton Court Palace Flower Show, where they cook on their own kitchen garden set with a mix of celebrity guests, chefs and horticultural experts. There are also films with some favourite TV chefs in their own kitchen gardens, plus exclusive access to exhibitors and show gardens, which all feature edible produce.
